title: Dog given certain food same time as specific tone

content.question: After several trials during which a dog is given a certain kind of food at the same time that a specific tone is sounded, there is evidence of conditioning if the dog salivates when

choices.label: the food and tone are presented together
a different tone is presented with the food

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
